alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Mason; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 7:36AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF MASON, ROBERTSON AND SOUTHEASTERN BRACKEN COUNTIES THROUGH 800 AM EST... At 735 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Fairview, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Maysville, Washington, Lewisburg, Mount Olivet, Germantown, Sardis, Blue Licks Battlefield, Murphysville, Alhambra, Stonewall, Mays Lick, Mitchells Mill, Peed, Helena, Tuckahoe, Hittville and Minerva. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
